bug.author: yaroslavvb
bug.summary: "Export as report" turns single chart with multiple series into multiple charts

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.87. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/wandb/client>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
Hello Yaroslav! At the moment, only the run page supports a single chart with multiple metrics on it. We're hoping to fix this soon!

Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yaroslavvb>@yaroslavvb</denchmark-link>
In the past year we've majorly reworked the CLI and UI for Weights & Biases. We're closing issues older than 6 months. Please comment to reopen.
